original_text: Also remember that some angels refused to obey God. They took more authority for themselves than God had given them. They left their own proper place with God in heaven. So God has tied them up as prisoners for ever in a completely dark place. He will keep them there until that great day when he will judge everyone.
korean_text: 또 자기 지위를 지키지 아니하고 자기 처소를 떠난 천사들을 큰 날의 심판까지 영원한 결박으로 흑암에 가두셨으며

sentences.original_text: Also remember that some angels refused to obey God.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 어떤 천사들이 하나님께 순종하기를 거부했다는 것을 기억하십시오.

sentences.original_text: They took more authority for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들을 위해 더 많은 권위를 가져왔습니다
하나님이 그들에게 주신 것보다 더 많은 권위를.

sentences.original_text: They left their own proper place
So God has tied them up as prisoners for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 하나님은 그들을 영원한 죄수로 묶어두셨습니다
